Key Match Events: Muhammad Ali scored the only goal in injury time
Post-Match Reflections: Phillippe Troussier praised Vietnamese players for their courage throughout the match but regretted that Vietnam lost to the visiting West Asian team in the last minute of injury time
Others: Iraqi players organized attacks with a primary focus on shots from the right side
Vietnamese players did not pose any real danger to the Iraqi side in the first half
Vietnamese goalkeeper Dang Van Lam worked rather hard to either save the ball or repel the shots due to home defendersâ€™ mistakes
Facing off the visiting players who were in good form, hosts Vietnam successfully kept a clean sheet in the first 45 minutes
After the break, the players coming from West Asia continued to show off their strength, challenging goalkeeper Van Lam
In the last minutes, the Vietnamese players retreated completely to their home field, hoping to defend the goalless score
Some players suffered from cramps but coach Phillippe Troussier no longer had a chance to make more substitutions
